title: GameStop Stocks Explained | Guests: Dave Rubin & Mati Greenspan | 1/28/21
description:
There are still National Guard troops deployed in D.C., and nobody has a reason why. The DHS issued a national terrorism advisory over domestic extremists, and it doesn’t mean Antifa. Pat Gray stops in to discuss the new regulations regarding flying with a firearm. What is happening with GameStop stock, and why are people so fired up about it? BlazeTV’s Dave Rubin joins to talk California Gov. Gavin Newsom’s popularity, liberals’ changing views on Biden, and how quickly the world can change. Quantum Economics CEO Mati Greenspan breaks down the economic effects of the GameStop situation. The angry Virginia dad in a viral video, Brandon Michon, joins to share the story of his passionate plea to his school board to reopen schools.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
